product_name: Feedback Sports Rakk Bicycle Storage Stand
long_description: Rakk Bicycle storage stand from Feedback Sports allows you store your bike standing up. Perfect in the garage or an apartment. Wheel slot accommodates road, mountain, cross, BMX and tandem bike; holds 20mm road tires up to 2.4 in. wide and mountain bike tire sizes 20 - 29 in. Spring-loaded arm holds bike by the tire; 3-point contact locks in front or rear wheel without the risk of scratching rim or spokes. Hands free use: simply roll the bike into the wheel slot and the swing arm holds it steady. Clip 2 or more Rakk stands together to create a versatile garage storage or retail flow display.
short_description: Rakk Bicycle storage stand from Feedback Sports allows you store your bike standing up. Perfect in the garage or an apartment.
